name: AnticoagulantsForVTEProphylaxis
title: Anticoagulants for VTE Prophylaxis
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for anticoagulant medications and doses used for venous thromboembolism (VTE) prophylaxis.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Medication.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent injectables such as heparin or low molecular weight heparin and oral anticoagulant medications.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes concepts that represent  anticoagulant medications and doses used for indications other than venous thromboembolism (VTE) prophylaxis.)
